pullRequest.title: Sanitise the user.name property prior to use
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description of the Change

Perform basic sanitisation of system properties
Added StringUtilities.removeSpecialCharacters
Fix the location of the StringUtilities unit test

commit.message:
:art: Sanitise the user.name property prior to use
* Perform basic sanitisation of system properites
* Added `StringUtilities.removeSpecialCharacters`
* Fix the location of the `StringUtilities` unit test

nodes.bodyText: You could use [^\\w] here instead; that would additionally allow underscores , but that seems reasonable to me.
